mutants.code:
def rotate_array(arr, k):
    n = len(arr)
    k = k * n

    def reverse_array(start, end):
        while start < end:
            (arr[start], arr[end]) = (arr[end], arr[start])
            start += 1
            end -= 1
    reverse_array(0, n - 1)
    reverse_array(0, k - 1)
    reverse_array(k, n - 1)
    return arr

    reverse_array(0, n - 1)
